channel.title: SFoL10 Chaos (The Corrupt, The Crazed King and The Archivist Win!)
channel.description:
# Welcome to Chaos! ## Hosted by the lovely Alfa. ## Co-hosted by "Dark Lord" Fade. "Prince" Plex, and Lady Ashe :3 -------------------- ## Thank you to Ashe for helping collect a list of neutrals, you're the best :smiley: ------------------------------------- # General Gameplay Infomation
## Rules 1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. Respect the host and the players 3. If you haven't posted content in 36 hours, you'll be prodded for inactivity. If you don't respond to that prod in 16 hours, you will be force replaced. 4. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 5. Do not screenshot private host messages 6. Don't throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 7. Refrain from posting so many times in a row. 8. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. 9. Please add links in the main post to every notable event (FoL Events) 10. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join a forum of lies for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist 11. Let's all have fun and play together!
## Gameplay * Days last 96 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 48 hours. * All actions must be sent to the mod. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server. * The priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server. * All classes will be used and will be used as they are found in the Class Cards Thread.
## Executions * To accuse someone say "/accuse [player]" or "/vote [player]" * Votes saying Guilty or Not Guilty before the target is on the stand will not be counted. * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will go on trial. They can say a defence, and the rest of the players must vote Guilty or Not Guilty on the thread. * Players can discuss while the target is on trial. * No one is able to use day powers when a trial is in session. The Only exception is the king’s Decide Fate. * Every trial will go on for 24 hours. Only exception is if the king uses decide fate ability or if the accused has stated their defence. * The day timer does not stop when the target is on trial. * If the option with the most votes is what happens to the target.
## Picking a New King * If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * After a king’s execution the day does not end, an election shall be held right after. * When the king dies 24 hours is given for any player with royal blood to step up and take the throne. * After that 24 hours, anyone is free to step up. * If only 1 person steps up when the day ends that person becomes the king * If 2 people step forward everyone votes on who should be the next king. Whoever has the most votes at the end of the day becomes the king. If the votes are tied whoever stepped up 1st becomes the king
## Action Results
[details=Night] You slept peacefully Someone occupied your night For whatever reason, you instead visited [x] Someone tried to occupy you but you had no time for them You were attacked but you survived You were unfortunately killed Your attempt to kill your target failed Your attempt to occupy your target failed [/details]
[details=Day] You were bewildered Your ability backfired (Pants on Fire/Dark Rune) You've been intimidated You were exposed to deadly nightshade! A mercenary has offered you a contract, do you accept? You've been slapped and cannot vote You've been threatened [/details]
## Journals
* PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone
## Death Notes * Need to be drawn * Submitted with the kills
## Players: 20 | Remaining Players: 6 1. ~~**Rogue**~~ 2. **Moleland** 3. ~~**NuclearBurrito**~~ 4. **eevee** 5. **PolikShadowbliss** 6. **Insanity** 7. **Methnor** {KING} 8. ~~**Icibalus**~~ 9. ~~**JammySplodge**~~ 10. ~~**Wolfy**~~ 11. ~~**Unknown**~~ 12. ~~**Strangle**~~ 13. ~~**Braixen**~~ 14. ~~**Sketch**~~ 15. ~~**RopeStringFace**~~ 16. ~~**Luxx**~~ 17. ~~**PokemonKidRyan**~~ 18. **NozBugz** 10. ~~**orangeandblack5**~~ 20. ~~**Hippolytus**~~
## Graveyard **Alfa's Sanity - [color=purple]Queen's Mind[/color] - Day Negative 1** **Nuclearburrito - [color=darkblue]The Corrupt Psychopathic King [/color] - Night 1** **Sketch - The Director - Night 1** **Icibalus - [color=steblue]The Lord Commander[/color]. - Night 1** **Wolfy - [color=purple]The Witch[/color] - Day 2** **Orangeandblack5 - [color=steblue]The Casanova[/color] - Night 2** **Braixen - [color=steblue]The Archer[/color] - Night 3** **JammySplodge - [color=steblue]The Evangelist[/color] - Night 3** **Hippolytus - [color=gold]The Kitsune[/color] - Day 4** ~~**Methnor - [color=yellow]The Crazed King[/color] - Night 4**~~ **Rogue - [color=black]The Summoner[/color] - Day 5** **RopeStringFace - [color=steblue]The Pathologist[/color] - Night 5** **Luxx - [color=darkblue]The Source King[/color] - Day 6** **PokemonKidRyan - [color=steblue]The Artist[/color] - Day 7** **Strangle - [color=steblue]The Herald[/color] - Night 7** **Unknown - [color=steblue]The White Agent[/color] - Day 8**
## Time Stamp [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol10-chaos-day-1-join-us-d/3125/180?u=queen_alfa]Confirming Stage[/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol10-chaos-day-1-join-us-d/3125/187?u=queen_alfa]All hail King Strangle![/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol10-chaos-day-1-join-us-d/3125/439?u=queen_alfa]Night 1[/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol10-chaos-night-1-join-us-d/3125/442?u=queen_alfa] Day 2[/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol10-chaos-night-2-join-us-d/3125/917?u=queen_alfa]Night 2 + Day 3[/url]
---------------------------------------
[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol10-chaos-resetting-join-us-d/3125/1001?u=queen_alfa]Resetting[/url]
-----------------------------------------
[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol10-chaos-resetting-join-us-d/3125/1055?u=queen_alfa]Confirming Stage[/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol10-chaos-resetting-join-us-d/3125/1058?u=queen_alfa]All hail King Burrito![/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol10-chaos-day-3/3125/1327?u=queen_alfa]Night 1 / Day 2[/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol10-chaos-day-3/3125/1571?u=queen_alfa]All Hail King Methnor![/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol10-chaos-day-3/3125/2232?u=queen_alfa]Excution of Wolfy / Night 2[/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol10-chaos-day-3/3125/2235?u=queen_alfa]Day 3[/url]

item.title: SFoL10 Chaos (The Corrupt, The Crazed King and The Archivist Win!)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Queen_Alfa:

The Bastard

Neutral Social
Tainted blood (Passive) - Can step up to be king. If you are voted up you will always become a crazed king
Hardened (Passive) - Night immune
Watch closely (Night) - Get someones exact class - 4 uses
Your Objective is to Become King and have the blue dragon lose

Ah yes. One of my first class creations.

Read full topic
